mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dictionary WHERE (#{id} IS NULL OR LOWER(id::text) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{id}), '%')) AND (#{value} IS NULL OR LOWER(value) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{value}), '%')) AND (#{isActive} IS NULL OR is_active = #{isActive})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary (id, category, value, description, is_active) VALUES (#{id}, #{category}, #{value}, #{description}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE dictionary SET is_active = false, deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE dictionary SET is_active = true, deleted_at = NULL WHERE id = #{id}
